episodes.title: Bar Fights at 14 and the Shocking Truth About Cult-Like Martial Arts Scams With Rob From McDojolife
episodes.description:
In this video, Miguel talks with Rob from @McDojoLife,  a YouTuber and influencer known for exposing fake martial arts. Rob shares his story of starting martial arts to defend himself and how it led him to an underground nightclub fighting ring in Jacksonville, where he fought grown men at just 14 years old. They discuss the lessons Rob learned from his sensei, the dangers of fake martial arts, and the surprising similarities between cults and fraudulent martial arts practices.
